name: Zatun Game Studio
tagline: Where Fun Gets Down To Business.
description:
Zatun is a creative, award-winning game development company specializing in game development and designing. We offer premium, quality game art and game development to publishers and game developers worldwide, since 2007.  
We have worked in collaboration on more than 200+ leading and top-notch game titles with over 300+ clients right from huge AAA developers to small indie studios.
Some of the game titles we have worked with include World of Tanks, W2k17, Warhammer 40,000 - Freeblade, Warhammer 40,000 - Battle of Tallarn, PanzerCorps, Igor, and Secret Passages.
We specialize in Art Outsourcing, External ArProductionon, Art Assets, 2D Vector Art, 2D Game Assets, 3D Game Models, 3D Characters, Unity 3D Game Development, VR Game Development, 3D Modeling, Zbrush Sculpting, iOS Game Development, Android Game Development, High Poly 3D Modeling, and HOG Scene.
